item.description: ğŸ“ˆ The Central Bank of Russia is set to implement a slight decrease in the key interest rate in light of worries that an increase in VAT could trigger higher inflation. item.description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Marina Chekurova, the head of the rating agency "Expert RA," stated in an interview with RIA Novosti that the Russian Central Bank's key interest rate is expected to drop to between 11% and 12% by the end of 2026, down from the current rate of 16.5%. She predicts that the regulator will begin actively lowering the rate in the latter half of 2026.

item.description: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Rubio highlighted advancements in discussions about Ukraine, stressing the importance of addressing the most challenging issues that remain. He pointed out that wars usually conclude through either surrender or negotiation, and since neither side has shown a willingness to surrender, negotiations are continuing. Talks between the U.S. and Ukraine are scheduled for Friday and Saturday in Miami. U.S. Ambassador to NATO Matthew Whitaker mentioned that the weekend's discussions will shed light on Moscow's plans for resolving the conflict by 2026.

item.description: ğŸš¨ğŸŒŸ Grayscale has indicated that the current volume of tokenized assets (RWA) is minimal, making up about 0.01% of the global stock and bond markets. However, by 2030, this volume is projected to grow by nearly 1000 times as advancements in blockchain infrastructure and regulations take shape. Tokenization is being recognized as the future, with significant implications for sectors like real estate, stocks, bonds, and more, as highlighted by the CEOs of Coinbase and BlackRock. MT in MAX
